text: Jacques Roubaud (5 December 1932 â€“ 5 December 2024) was a French poet, writer, and mathematician. He was born in Caluire-et-Cuire, France. Roubaud taught mathematics at University of Paris X Nanterre and poetry at EHESS. He was a member of the Oulipo group. Roubaud died on his 92nd birthday on 5 December 2024 in Paris, France. ==References== ==Other websites== *Documentation critique sur J.
